p: 超过65个.NET控件，包括那些你在任何地方都找不到的控件。开发WinForms控件的ComponentOne Studio充满了聪明的代码自由的设计者 有超强的内置功能，可以超越开箱体验，超强的灵活性且保证这些控件可以经受时间的考验。

tr.td: ComponentOne Editor for Winforms now supports loading and saving text from and to RTF files. Any XHTML content rendered into the Editor Document can now be saved directly to the RTF format. Loading an RTF file shows the content with RTF formatting intact. Launch Demo.

ul.li: ComponentOne GanttView for WinForms delivers a Microsoft Project-like user experience for project management. It provides a graphical diagram of a schedule that helps to plan, coordinate, and track specific tasks in a project. Manage your projects effectively and efficiently with added support for constraints, dependencies, resources, styles and more. Launch Demo.
